ISSUE.TITLE: Friendly error message for aliasing to nested subdomains
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ``` > Error! Unknown error: Error: The supplied alias "foo.bar.now.sh" is not a valid hostname. Make sure it excludes http:// and slashes ``` The error happens when you add aliases by `now alias` with settings in `now.json`. I think we should display a more friendly message ~~if we don't support nested subdomains~~ (we don't support it).
